document_data.name: Kumquat
document_data.mainbody: '''Kumquats''' were a type of tree-grown citrus fruit found in the Realms.
document_data.Availability: Kumquats could be found sold in [[Halruaa]] and [[Neverwinter]].
document_data.Trivia: It was traditional for those performing the epic poem [[Neverwinter Nights (poem)|''Neverwinter Nights'']] to balance bowls full of kumquats atop their heads while doing so.
